title: Edgerunner Boost Pack
description: Advanced movement suite with dash injectors, wall-runs, and neon particle trails.
longDescription: Slip into any chase with the Edgerunner Boost Pack. This mobility-focused collection adds configurable boosters, air-dodge rewrites, and cinematic neon trails that adapt to your movement speed. Every ability ships with CET toggles, REDscript hooks, and controller-friendly presets.
featureList: Toggleable burst-sprint that consumes adaptive stamina
Wall-run assist with magnetized path prediction
Chromatic particle trails that recolor per installed cyberware
